CustomField.formula: IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Project_Status__c, 'Active'), ISPICKVAL(Project_Status__c, 'On-Hold') ), Open_Milestone__c > 0, Overdue_Milestone__c = 0 ), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green", 20, 20), IF( AND( ISPICKVAL(Project_Status__c, 'Active'), Open_Milestone__c = 0, Overdue_Milestone__c = 0 ), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_yellow.gif", "Yellow", 20, 20), IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Project_Status__c, 'Active'), ISPICKVAL(Project_Status__c, 'On-Hold') ), Overdue_Milestone__c > 0 ), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red", 20, 20), IF( OR( ISPICKVAL(Project_Status__c, 'Active'), ISPICKVAL(Project_Status__c, 'On-Hold') ), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_grey.gif", "Grey", 20, 20), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_green.gif", "Green", 20, 20) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Project Health Flag
